```{block type="col-6"}
# Personal summary {.summary}
I am a cognitive psychologist-turned-computer scientist. I am passionate about applying insights from the behavioural neurosciences to design digital technology that is sensitive to human limitations and biases, particularly in relation to attention and self-regulation.

```

# Selected Publications {.publications}

```{r, echo=FALSE}
publications <- readxl::read_xlsx("../cv_data/publications.xlsx")

publications %>%
  mutate(other = replace_na(other, "")) %>% 
  mutate(author_year = str_c("*", authors, " (", year, ")*. ")) %>%  #italicise authors and year
  mutate(title = str_c("[", title, "](", url, ")")) %>% #turn title into link
  mutate(citation = str_c(author_year, title, venue, other, sep = " ")) %>%
  select(citation) %>% 
  mutate(citation = str_replace(citation, "Lyngs, U.", "__Lyngs, U.__")) %>% # make my name bold
  knitr::kable(format = "html")

```
